name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed - Escape from the Coolsonian
summary: A spooky point and click game where you help Scooby and Shaggy escape from a museum which has a fiendishly effective jumpscare. Made to promote the Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed movie.

name: SCP: Event Classified
summary: SCP: Event Classified is a unique horror shooter that allows players to take on a role of a soldier, prisoner, scientist and even monster. Fight other players or unite with them to survive in this mysterious facility.

name: Schwerpunkt
summary: Schwerpunkt is a World War 2 military simulation game. Take control of hundreds of units over a large frontline, making daring manoeuvres to push your enemy back. Fight in one of the scenarios given or make your own in the map maker.

name: Scope Out
summary: Take the shot — or be taken out. A 1v1 Top Down online sniper duel where matches are fought in best-of-3 rounds. Win three rounds to claim victory. Every bullet, every breath, and every move matters.

name: Scale Bullet: After Story
summary: A Roguelite action shooter where you dodge bullets, attack enemies, and power up with skills and items. While the map stays the same, different skill combos and item drops change your strategy each time. Keep challenging and master your own style!

name: Scary Tales Vol. 1
summary:
After a late Friday night of partying, you wake up to a strange package at your door. Four mysterious tapes you don't remember ordering. Will you dare to watch them?

Four of the scariest Puppet Combo shorts in one shocking anthology! They will rattle your body and haunt your dreams!

- Work the NIGHT SHIFT in a desolate convenience store.
- Defend your family from blood thirsty SPIDERS!
- Clean up the streets and FEED ME BILLY
- Witness the shocking tapes of THE RIVERSIDE INCIDENT
- Bonus: Play the Power Drill Massacre Arcade game in Night Shift

name: Scottside
summary: "Scottside" is a non-linear visual novel in the thriller genre. A small provincial town may seem quite dull. However, everything changes when you find a strange object in the forest.

name: SCP: Facility
summary: SCP: Facility is a PvP - Strategy online multiplayer game, where you, class-d, scientists, and more, are trapped in a 4-layer underground containment facility after a containment breach, with the Anomalies loose. Will you be able to escape to safety? there's only one way to find that out.

name: SCP: Nemesi
summary: SCP: Nemesi is a multiplayer survival-horror game where one player takes on the role of the SCP (anomalous creatures, each with its own abilities and appearance), and the other four players play as Humans, each with their own personal goals and tasks that may branch into different paths.

name: SCP-D38813
summary: A creepy-pasta narrative game for the Playdate console in which you play an SCP Foundation researcher attempting to unravel the mystery of an anomalous Playdate. The device has enciphered classic articles from the SCP wiki, and you'll have to crank to crack the cryptograms and solve the mystery.

name: S.C.A.R.S.
summary:
In this game players take control of cars that take the shape of different animals. The game itself takes the role as a combat racing game as it features weapons to use against your opposition while racing, and the computers can do the same to you. The game has four modes: Grand Prix, Challenge and Time Attack.

The object of this game is to compete in the Grand Prix and to unlock new tracks and cars. The difficulty of each tournament is determined by which cup you choose to race for. The first cup you race for is the Carbon cup, and once you've beaten that you will unlock other cups that are based on elements like crystal, and diamond. Once you have won a tournament you will unlock a new cup to compete for, new levels to race in, and the chance to challenge other cars to gain access to them for use in Grand Prix races and vs mode.

While Racing you can acquire weapons located around the tracks to help you finish the race quicker or to slow down your opponents so you can overtake them. The combat system is different from many games, except for having health and being destroyed for a limited amount of time, if you or an enemy is hit by a weapon you will be temporarily be slowed downed which gives your opponent time to overtake you. They're some weapons that can be avoided by using your cars jump jets; all cars have jump jets and can be used to avoid certain weapons, however not all weapons can be avoided even with the Jump Jets.

The weapons are: turbo boost, magnets, seeker-style missiles, a boomerang, time bombs, stingers, stoppers, rounds of bullets, and a shield.

name: SCP: The Endurance
summary: You play as a Class-D tasked with supervising 3 floors full of SCP entities through a series of nights. Will you endure til the end?

name: Schematic Void
summary: Point-and-click, an anti-horror adventure with a mashed fourth wall, stylish minimalistic graphics, a relaxing plot and other advantages.

name: Scratches: Director's Cut
summary:
Dark Legends surround the old abandoned Blackwood house, secluded far away in the northern wastelands.

For writer Michael Arthate, this cold, solitary atmosphere is fodder for his restless imagination. But Michael soon becomes distracted by the mysteries offered up, as he follows a trail exploring and delving into the secrets of the past. As he is drawn deeper into the story, his sleep is shattered by mysterious noises, and he is plagued by nightmares that cross into reality.

Whose shadows lurk in the dark corners? Is that lonely house inhabited by restless spirits of the past or something more sinister? What is that sound that chills to the very bone...scratching?

Join Michael in a suspenseful adventure, as you explore beautiful and chilling environments. Prowl dark corners and solve puzzles leading to the solution of a tale begun with obsession, and ending with madness and murder.

The Director’s Cut includes an alternate ending that might be more shocking than the original.

name: Scary new year
summary: In "Scary NEW YEAR" you try to escape after waking up in the Dark Hell. StoryYou were just celebrating the New Year with your friends and had a drink too many. Your memory of the day is fuzzy at best, only the strong flavour of your last drink lingers on. You wake up in the middle of nowhere. Disoriented and without a clue how or why you got here. The only thing you have on you is your bag and a flashlight. You should get out of here quick.GameplayExplore the surroundings of the various islands. You can find abandoned buildings and houses. Don't get caught by the local monsters. Your weapon is a flashlight. So run. Your objective is finding the escape point of the map and leaving the place.

name: School Simulator
summary: Make you feel good in the school! Try what would it be like if you could do anything in the school break. Crush! Don’t kid yourself. Break out from the roll of eager beaver! You don’t have to worry about thing, just do it!The school is full of movable objects, just grab them and throw them to your schoolmates, but don’t delay, because they are ready!If they hit you, it will be difficult to stand up, so be careful! The targeting line will help you to throw accurate.

name: Scarlett
summary: A visual novel by NekoNeko for PC.

name: Scarlet Hollow: Episode 4
summary: Stella is missing after she run off last night. Kaneeka suggests go looking for her. Her mom Sybil wants to meet you in the afternoon to discuss something about the mistery and the clinic is still supernaturally attracting you.

name: Scarlet Hollow: Episode 3
summary: Yesterday you promised that today you'll participate in ghost hunting at Oscar's house but before that you can spend some quality time with Tabitha and visit Stella's and Kaneeka's friend Reese.

name: Screwball
summary: Screwball is a story-rich puzzle game built around crafting items. Hilariously voiced by a one-man cast, the game is hand-animated to appear as though you’re playing a cartoon strip, and offers hours of gameplay with more than 80 custom-tailored puzzles and over 500 craftable items.

name: Scars of Mars
summary: Scars of Mars is a new real-time RPG. During combat and exploration, time flows, so you must make split-second decisions, execute precise commands swiftly, and vanquish enemies within a limited time. It's a thrilling experience that captures the unique tension and satisfaction of the gameplay.

name: Scrambled Egg
summary: A one or two player maze game published and developed by Technos in 1983.

name: Score
summary:
Warning, this game is in Early Access Alpha stage bugs and constant content changes are to be expected.
Score, is a Sport and Profession Driven Open World Multiplayer Game where players compete for fame, glory and wealth on a global scale on and off the pitch. Score's Legend City environment is a very large open world which is to 100% user controlled through their professions.

name: Scary Granny
summary: **"It Seems That We Will Never Leave Here!"**

name: Scary Magic Zombie
summary: EVIL SCIENTISTS have created a SCARY MAGIC ZOMBIE! Play as a top secret spy, who enters the zombie facility, and collects information about the zombie. But be cautious! The zombie is very dangerous!

name: Scourge of Scavengers
summary: Fly high!

name: Screaming In The Basement
summary: The main character is mike, an experienced journalist who always strives to uncover the truth, According to locals, restless souls inhabit this place, but this needs to be confirmed., the game takes place in 1991.

name: Scrambler
summary: Scrambler is a fast-paced rogue-like wave survival game where you control adorable cartoon characters fighting off endless waves of quirky enemies. Level up, collect power-ups, and survive as the challenge intensifies in procedurally generated levels.

name: Scorch
summary: It's been 30 years since a terrible arson attack erased an entire family. Until today the culprit has been on the loose. You are sent to investigate a similar incident in this narrative exploration game.

name: Scrap Age
summary: Scrape Age is a free-to-play online game where you and your friends fight hordes of robots in post apocalyptic world, join forces in this fast paced, VR, arena, rogue-like, FPS.

name: Scavenger of Dunomini
summary: A mix of match-3 and tower-defense in a post-apocalyptic setting, where you have to protect and recycle your trash-pit!

name: Schoolboy Escape 2: Village
summary: Grandma and grandpa won’t let you have fun? Outsmart them and plan your runaway! Immerse yourself in an incredible adventure, solve puzzles and stay out of sight!

name: Scary Girl
summary: In this side-scrolling action game, you play as Scarygirl – a girl who has been adopted by a giant intelligent octopus and is trying to figure out who the man haunting her dreams is. Traverse unique, extremely vibrant, colorful, and magical worlds in a seamless mix of 2D and 3D platforming action. You can go it alone in single-player mode or grab a friend and team up in co-op gameplay and fight alongside Bunniguru – the giant kung-fu rabbit. And as you advance, you’ll be able to purchase new weapons and new moves, and discover countless secrets along the way. It’s a mesmerizing fairytale, but the creepy-cute tough-as-nails Scarygirl is no damsel in distress.

name: Schoolbreak.io
summary:
Schoolbreak.io is a fun online multiplayer game about students trying to create as much chaos as possible in school and teachers trying to save the school!

Once the break starts, it's your task as a student to produce as much chaos as possible to drive the chaos level up. When the level reaches 100%, the students win and the teachers get fired!

If you play as a teacher, your job is to protect the school - try to catch the students in the act and get them detention! But be careful, if you get it wrong you have to explain yourself to their parents!

Decide - Will you save the school or devastate it?

name: Schrödinger's Cat and the Raiders of the Lost Quark
summary:
Schrödinger’s Cat is a fun, fanatic, wacky and colourful puzzle laden platform game, set in a unique and quirky quantum physics world.

Combine and create useful bits of temporary matter such as, bridges, ladders and grenades to combat and subdue the kleptomaniacal gluons and cantankerous bosons now running amok to help Schrodinger’s Cat round up all the escapees from the particles zoo.

name: Scurri
summary: Scurri is an action-adventure indie game in which you play as a young squirrel who is searching for the means in which to save your family from certain peril, while you avoid peril yourself from the hunters that hide in the darkness around you!

name: Screamer
summary: High-octane action and anime aesthetics collide in this arcade racing game, featuring fighting mechanics and a storyline that hits hard. In this world, some race for glory while others seek power or revenge. Every race is a fight and every battle is personal.

name: Scarlet Snow
summary: A haunting tale of sin and redemption, bound by a twisted fate. Can three individuals uncover the tragic past hidden beneath the crimson-stained snow?

name: School Curse2
summary: The curse continues...

name: Screw-Nut
summary: Screw-Nut - This is a game in which you need to melt the nut

name: School Game
summary: School Game is a game with RPG elements. You create your character and evolve in a academy environement. Learn skills, buy equipement, meet students, build your reputation and budget, be a member of the student council and various clubs, and improve your relationship with the head of the student council, which you may decide to replace.

name: SCP
summary: Explore, craft, and survive in a post-apocalyptic world where SCP anomalies roam freely. Brace yourself for nightly assaults as SCP-049's twisted creations close in.

name: Scivics
summary: Collect, construct and conquer. Choose your Faction and dominate the city. Collect cards, expand your Influence and crush your rivals!

name: Scarlet Nexus: Bond Enhancement Pack 1
summary:
The SCARLET NEXUS Bond Enhancement Pack 1 DLC contains additional costume and weapon sets for all characters with new designs by external creators.

The pack also includes new Bond Episodes, new SAS abilities gained from Bond Level Expansion (Bond Level EX), and ways to enjoy new sides to your favorite characters that you didn’t see in the main game!

name: SCP: Secret Facility
summary: Welcome to SCP: Secret Facility - Zone 15, an immersive and thrilling first-person survival horror game set within the enigmatic and dangerous world of the SCP Foundation. In this installment, players will delve into the mysteries of Zone 15, a highly classified and isolated sector where some of the most anomalous and deadly SCP objects are contained.

name: Schizophrenic Rooms
summary: Diagnosed with schizophrenia, try to leave your company while terrifying things happen.

name: Scheme
summary: This is a first-person simulation management game where you need to purchase items or produce robots as prizes to set up a ring toss mini-game. You can also design lottery schemes, print and sell tickets to operate a store and earn assets. Complete periodic tasks within the limited time.

name: Scrap Warden
summary: Bring order to space in your own way in Scrap Warden! An epic action strategy through junk filled space missions and enemies. Explore various worlds, battle AI driven pirates and collect material to cobble together advanced weaponry and upgrades, all in a beautiful, and dangerous universe.

name: Scritchy Scratchy
summary: Scritchy Scratchy is a satisfying scratch card incremental game. Buy tons of scratch-off's, buy an auto scratcher to do all the hard work and win jackpots! Will you risk it all for the big reward or play it safe?

name: Scrabble
summary:
The fantastically fun crossword game is now specially designed for your PC or Mac. Build words using letter tiles and enjoy quick, easy-to-learn controls and fantastic features. Play solo, compete with the computer, or challenge up to three friends in a Hot Seat challenge. Choose from a variety of game styles. Adjust the difficulty level when you play the computer. Track your best words and top scores, and chart your progress to become the best SCRABBLE player you can be.Game Features
Enjoy all the fun of SCRABBLE right on your PC or Mac
Play solo, compete against the computer, or challenge friends to Hot Seat action
Adjust difficulty levels and game styles to suit your skills
View your stats, including best words, top scores and more
Learn to play quickly and easily with helpful game tips

name: Scattergories Weekly
summary: Think fast, be original, and stay sharp! Scattergories Weekly brings the classic party game to your living room’s screen. Cozy up on the couch with friends and family for a fun-filled game night. Roll the 20-sided letter die, flip the sand timer, and think of unique answers for each category on the list. Players race against the clock, writing down answers to categories—such as things in your car, reality TV shows, famous animals, and things you shouldn't touch—each beginning with the same letter, like "S." New games with themed categories are released weekly!

name: Science Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Scavland
summary: Scavland is a hardcore, top-down pixel art survival game set in a Post-Apocalyptic Soviet Era. Explore a world ravaged by war and the deadly Mist, scavenging for resources, taking risky jobs, and seeking refuge in harsh settlements. The wasteland is relentless—everything is out to kill you.

name: SCP: Site-19
summary: SCP: Site-19 is a mobile multiplayer SCP Foundation based game. Every round map is randomly generated & roles are random. So you never expect who you play as or who you gonna bump into.

name: Scary School Simulator 2
summary: Escape from horror anime ghost story in your school's classroom!

name: Scraftion
summary: This game is a multiplayer survival game with multiple maps. To survive, you have to find the right materials on the right maps. Build your base and have a good time with your friends.

name: Scoundrel Solitaire
summary: Delve through the dungeon eradicating all monsters in your path. Manage your health potions and weapons wisely to ensure victory!

name: Scaredom
summary: Scaredom is a 2D, fast-paced action-adventure platformer where you play as a Nightmare going to war against the army of Dreams. Explore surreal worlds, meet bizarre, fearsome characters and use your Nightmare powers to ruthlessly slaughter your enemies.

name: Scrapbook Memories
summary:
Your first year attending Divine Crown Academy will be your last—time to make the most of it!

As a new transfer student to the prestigious Divine Crown Academy, your third year of high school is sure to be one to remember. The academy’s after-school clubs are full of colorful personalities, but four students in particular catch your eye. They make fast friends, but your bond may go deeper than you expected…

How will you make this a year to remember?

name: Scuba Diver
summary: Put on your swim fins and get ready to dive into adventure! But be careful because your search for the treasure of the sunken Spanish galleon is filled with danger. Man-eating fish and vicious sea monsters infect the waters where you must dive! To top things off you only have 60 seconds worth of oxygen for every dive.

name: Schrodinger's Cat Burglar
summary: A puzzle heist adventure with a quantum flavour! The player controls Mittens the cat as she stumbles into a quantum experiment and gains incredible new powers - the ability to be in two places at once. Explore, solve logic puzzles and evade capture by pest control robots to ultimately save the day!

name: Schbibinman Zero: Shockman Zero
summary:
A Super Famicom game in the Schbibinman/Shockman series, first released as a (view-limited) downloadable game via the Broadcast Satellaview satellite service in Japan and later re-released in cartridge format, many years after the Super Famicom lifespan, in 2017.

In 2024, the game was announced for an European and American release, published by Retro-bit, with an all-new official English translation for the first time.

name: Scamp: High Hat Havoc
summary: Join Scamp, the tiny terror with an attitude on his quest to free his master. Explore the big hat mines in this quirky fantasy adventure game.

name: Scram 81
summary: Scram - 81 is a clone of the arcade game Scramble which is viewed from the side with the screen scrolling left to right constantly. You have to fly a spaceship above the surface of a planet bombing ground targets while shooting or bombing missiles with your laser. As you fly, your fuel level decreases but you can bomb fuel dumps to increase it. If you hit a missile or the surface then you lose one of three lives.

name: Scenes from the Heart
summary: In this heartwarming Visual Novel, you will aid two of your new classmates while also getting to know them better. Explore the world of improv theater, tease the group's Tsundere, learn about their backstory, and work together to create your own Visual Novel.

name: ScubaVenture: The Search For Pirate's Treasure
summary: You play a diver who must find the treasures of the Barbarosa, a sunken pirate ship. In search of those treasures you encounter the inhabitants of the Caribbean waters and pirate ghosts.

name: SCHiM
summary: SCHiM is a game about jumping through shades in a challenging and lively environment, touch the light and it's over! This fast-paced 3D platformer takes elements of light & animation and adds them directly to the gameplay, delivering an experience that you will only find in SCHiM.

name: SCP Fatal Flee
summary: Delve into the heart of the SCP Foundation in SCP Fatal Flee, a gripping puzzle adventure game crafted with Unreal Engine. Explore a labyrinthine facility, solve intricate puzzles, and confront terrifying SCPs in this unique and challenging experience. Created by a passionate young developer, SCP Fatal Flee offers a fresh perspective on the SCP universe.

name: Schoolbound
summary: Play as a student and discover the Haunted Card Collection of the past and the Ghosts bound to it.

name: Scraps of the Machine
summary: FPS Mech Action! Pilot a mass of steel through a single player campaign set in a desolate landscape. Target enemy armor or weapons to wear them down piece by piece, find upgrades to improve your mech or change its loadout, and survive in a world of rust and decay. Discover, Destroy, Scavenge.

name: Screw Master
summary: Are you good with a screwdriver?

name: Screw Master 3D: Pin Puzzle
summary:
Screw Master 3D: Twist & solve 3D puzzles! Challenging brain teasers await
Unleash Your Inner Engineer with Screw Master 3D: Pin Puzzle!
Ready to twist your mind and test your spatial skills? Dive into the captivating world of Screw Master 3D, where physics-based puzzles meet addictive gameplay!

name: Scrabble
summary:
Every letter counts in the original crossword game. Play SCRABBLE alone or take on up to three friends.

Take turns creating words on the game board using letters from your tray. Each letter is worth a certain amount of points, which contribute to the total score of your word. Use the board to your advantage by placing words on one or more premium squares, such as a "Double Letter Score" or "Triple Word Score."

name: Scraper: Gauntlet
summary: Scraper: Gauntlet is a VR RPG wave shooter featuring weapon customization, unique missions, and enemy modifiers. Play as an HRF Operative tasked with retrieving blueprints from a secret facility and use every tactical advantage at your disposal to overcome the challenges you face!

name: Scar of the Doll: A Psycho-Horror Story about the Mystery of an Older Sister
summary:
Scar of the Doll is an original psycho-suspense Visual Novel produced by Child-Dream in 1998, when became an exceptional hit. With its psychologically compelling horror elements and highly dramatic scenario, the game became a hot topic of discussion, including a feature in a mystery magazine, becoming a pioneer in the indie adventure genre.

This 2022 remake completely overhauls the original game's visuals. New content for the second half of the story has been added. In addition, a zapping scenario from different sub-character's points of view has been introduced.

name: School Owner
summary: School Owner is a construction and management simulation game where you manage an entire school, from pre-school to college.

name: SCP: Infohazard
summary: SCP: Infohazard is a survival horror game based on the stories of the SCP Foundation, where you take on the role of a test subject who becomes the survivor or a reality-bending disaster. To survive, you must restore reality fragments around the facility while avoiding some of the most dangerous monsters and anomalies that they contain. You must navigate through the high-tech facility and to find a way to stop what might just be an end-of-the-world scenario. SCP: Infohazard immerses you in the inner workings of The SCP Foundation like never before, with breathtaking details, clever puzzles, heart-pounding stealth, combat, and more. Use the environment to your advantage as you avoid detection, shoot around corners, distract the monstrous anomalies, and more.

name: SciGirl: The Internship
summary: SciGirl: The Internship, is a 2D Platformer adventure game set in a university laboratory where a professor is trying to synthesize a chemical that can make things smaller or larger. Our protagonist is a post-graduate young girl, led by her dreams of becoming a real scientist, she starts an internship in the university laboratory under the professor’s guidance.

name: Scream or Die: Virtual Circus
summary: Horror game. The player needs to get out of the maze with animatronics.

name: Scholar of the Arcane Arts
summary: Scholar of the Arcane Arts is a Roguelike Action RPG where every spell you cast interacts with one another. Learn new spells, solve puzzles, unlock secret dungeons, and defeat monstrous beings to save the world invaded by five Planes of magic!

name: Scuffed Rocket League
summary: This fan made game of Rocket League is kinda scuffed.

name: School Labyrinth
summary: School Labyrinth is a co-op horror survival game for max 4 players. You can join your friends and try to escape from the process-generated school maze.

name: Scott Adams Scoops
summary: Compilation of four Scott Adams text adventures.

name: School Night Seance
summary: School Night Séance is a modern take on the point and click adventure genre. A pair of best friends; the impulsive Melony, and the practical Letty, find themselves separated in a haunted mansion after performing an ill-advised séance. The girls will need to work together to solve puzzles, uncover the mansion’s mysterious history, and finally, reunite and escape the house!

name: Scarlet Defiance: The Wall Between Us
summary: In this dark fantasy yuri visual novel, follow the events that lead up to the fateful meeting of two young women. Accompany Sofia, a human revolutionary, and Vlatka, the vampire princess, as they navigate political upheaval, forbidden romance, and the ugliness of war.

name: Scandal in the Spotlight
summary: The ultimate long-running boy band, Revance. One night you attend their after-concert party and receive a mysterious invitation from the guys in the band! They drop a bombshell! Their lyricist has gone missing and they want you to fill in. You start a new life with these singers... and begin the deception of millions of fans.

name: Scorpion Solitaire
summary: Enjoy playing Scorpion Solitaire from the #1 Classic Card Game Collection for free. Customize your game with awesome card designs, backgrounds and win animations adding even more fun to this classic game.

name: Scarlet Hollow: Episode 2
summary: The second episode of the game Scarlet Hollow. Last night you encountered something beyond your understanding - start to investigate the matter with Stella and Kaneeka or forget about that and spend the day with your cousin Tabitha. Either way soon enough you will get in another supernatural event.

name: Scuttle's Thingamubobs
summary: The player must fly around and collect items from the ocean below while avoiding obstacles. Later hacked to create Dinglehoppers, which is nearly identical to the original.

name: Schoolboy SIM
summary: In Schoolboy SIM, you play as a boy trapped inside his own home, turned into a prison by his strict and authoritarian parents. With no way to contact the outside world, your only option is to escape! But it won’t be easy—locked doors, hidden clues, and ever-watchful parents stand in your way. Use your intelligence, stealth, and resourcefulness to uncover secrets, solve puzzles, and outsmart your captors before it’s too late.

name: Scared of Zombies
summary: Survive in the city with endless zombies rushing in!

name: Scarlet Nexus: Brain Eater Pack 3
summary: The Scarlet Nexus Brain Eater Pack DLC contains a new episode which explores an unseen side of Karen Travers, 2 different costume sets for all characters, new Vision Simulator missions, as well as other new challenges and rewards!

name: Screen Boy
summary: Screen Boy is a fun 2D platformer adventure full of excitement and danger! Join Screen Boy as he explores colourful worlds, dodges traps, and takes on massive bosses. With smooth controls and action-packed levels, it’s a thrilling quest that keeps you playing! Can you Save Screen Girl?

name: Scary Cargo
summary: A co-op survival horror for 14 players deliver cargo, stay alive, and trust no one for too long.

name: Scrapworks Simulator
summary: You start as a scrap collector in Scrapworks Simulator and work your way toward building a large production workshop. There’s an active trading system among players; you can sell your products to others, establish business partnerships, or take on custom orders.

name: Scary Together
summary: Scary Together is a 4-player co-op horror game. Explore terrifying levels filled with jump scares, solve puzzles, and experience the thrill of being scared together. Perfect for players who love screaming—and laughing—with friends. Screams turn into laughter as you watch your friends freak out

name: Scarred Steel
summary: A brutal medieval roguelite where every scar tells your story. Permanent injuries, hard choices, and bloody duels shape your path in a dying world.

name: Scrabble
summary: Welcome to Scrabble! This version of Scrabble features an artificial intelligence (AI) named Maven who will both challenge you and teach you new words.

name: Scramble Star Crossing
summary: Embark on a stellar action-puzzle adventure! Engage in local multiplayer battles with 2-4 players. Hone your skills as a Star Clearer in our many single-player modes, clearing colorful stars in the night sky. Or unravel the mysteries of the world and its inhabitants with a huge cast of characters!

name: Scooter Slayer
summary: Scooter Slayer is a musical racing rhythm arcade game that turns your or built-in songs into a unique track, the shape of which, as well as the speed of your car, will depend on the selected song.

name: Screamer 2
summary: The follow-up to Screamer is an arcade-style racing game. Unlike its predecessor, it offers a more rally-oriented gameplay. The twelve selectable high-performance road cars of the previous game have been replaced with four rally cars. The game features an improved graphics engine (SVGA) and various tracks including England, Switzerland, Egypt, Colombia, and others. These tracks may be slippery or contain various obstacles and scenery objects such as birds, helicopters, cows, etc. Split-screen head-to-head competitive two-player mode is available.

name: ScreamRide
summary: Screamride is a full-featured, physics-based coaster game where creativity and destruction are equally welcomed. This game features stunning high definition graphics, hundreds of customizable building components, physics-based destruction, cinematic collisions, unlockable levels, in-game leaderboards, global rankings & more.

name: Scorchwalkers
summary: Pilot your own Scorchwalker in this deck-building roguelite adventure! Choose your own destiny as you pick which comrades to save, which cards to craft, which Kaijus to battle, and ultimately, which path to take.

name: SCP: Echoes
summary: Hidden away from the public, you must survive in a top secret facility, filled with anomalous entities. Will you save the world, cause destruction, or end humanity as we know it?

name: Scoop it! Crane Game
summary: The fan-favourite arcade classic—The Crane Game—returns, powered up! Packed with more content and fresh new controls! Become a Crane Master!

name: Scrap Dealer Simulator
summary: Run your grandfather’s old scrapyard, collect and dismantle scrap, craft materials, and sell them at the second-hand shop. Manage hunger and thirst while upgrading your business with new machines, storage, and vehicles. Pay off your debts, expand your scrapyard, and turn junk into fortune!

name: School Exit Class 8
summary: An "Exit 8"-style anomaly-hunting horror game. In a haunted school, if something feels off—turn back. Classrooms, restrooms, the nurse's office—nothing is quite right. The closer you get to the exit, the more your memory—and your self—begin to distort.

name: Scary Tales: Horror School
summary: Scary Tales: Horror School is a first-person survival horror game where you must solve puzzles, evade terrifying entities, and escape a haunted school. With three unique escape routes, each offering different challenges, can you survive the nightmare or become another lost soul?

name: Scramble
summary:
The player controls an aircraft, referred to in the game as a "Jet," and has to guide it across a scrolling terrain, battling obstacles along the way. The ship is armed with a forward-firing weapon and bombs; each weapon has its own button. The player must avoid colliding with the terrain and other enemies, while simultaneously maintaining its limited fuel supply which diminishes over time. More fuel can be acquired by destroying fuel tanks in the game.

The game is divided into six sections, each with a different style of terrain and different obstacles. There is no intermission between each section; the game simply scrolls into the new terrain. Points are awarded based upon the number of seconds of being alive, and on destroying enemies and fuel tanks. In the final section, the player must destroy a "base". Once this has been accomplished, a flag denoting a completed mission is posted at the bottom right of the screen. The game then continues by returning to the first section once more, with a slight increase in difficulty.

name: Scrutinized
summary: Work to expose the numerous criminal degenerates that plague your quiet town. Use citizen-issued reports, police records, social media accounts, text conversations, and more to determine who’s an actual threat and who’s harmless, all while avoiding the killers trying to infiltrate your home.

name: Scavenger Hunt: Italy
summary:
In Scavenger Hunt: Italy you have to solve different puzzles to reach the goal. The puzzles lead you across Italy in different levels.
To master the levels and the puzzles you need internet access and a web browser!
The game will be available in English and German.

name: SCP022
summary: This is a short physics game about escaping from a closed chamber.

name: SCP: Control Error
summary: SCP: CONTROL ERROR is a short psychological horror game where you take part in a live experiment inside a restricted underground facility. The test begins. You're observed.

name: Scarecrow Tactics
summary: A strategy card game where players use scarecrow cards to deceive each other about the number of their soldiers. With unique yet simple rules, strategic scarecrows, and quirky, hideous mercenaries, players must survive a dreadful battle where losing means being devoured by Water Deers!

name: Schlangen-Schmaus
summary: Schlangen-Schmaus is a multiplayer arcade game developed with Unity 6 that reimagines the classic Snake mechanics in a competitive battle royale format. Players navigate an arena to consume items and grow in length, utilizing strategy to cut off and trap opponents without hitting walls or themselves. The game distinguishes itself through its tournament structure, where players compete in intense skill-based matches for physical real-world prizes rather than just in-game high scores.

name: Scrapped
summary: Get scrap, charge beacons and build unlockable robo-friends to survive!

name: Schachkampf
summary: A fantasy chess game in a beautiful pixelart world. This is the game you always wanted on your SNES back in the days.

name: Scrapwings
summary: ScrapWings is a classic arcade airplane game. Craft equipment for your ship by recycling scrap metal and take on the space pirate fleet.

name: Scrap Bulwark Guide
summary: "Scrap Bulwark Guide" is a tower defense game blending exploration and RPG mechanics. As a survivor in a post-apocalyptic city, you must recruit others, scavenge building materials from ruins, build street barricades, and fend off nightly zombie hordes to ultimately lead your group to safety.

name: Scarlet Hunt
summary: In a dystopian world ruled by vampire lords, an opportunity arises. Participate in a deadly hunt for a chance at freedom... *if* you can outrun your hunters. Will you finally break your chains - or be dragged into the abyss?

name: Scuffy Game
summary: Scuffy Game is a First-Person Multiplayer platformer game that involves you to be the last one standing.

name: Scarecrow Co-op 2
summary: Cleanse a forest with your friends.

name: Scryer's Shadow
summary:
Winner of the 2025 Ukie Student Game Jam!
You stray too far from your village and stumble upon something very sinister...

Stay out of sight of the piercing eye by jumping from shadow to shadow in this intense platformer!
developers: Two Ferrets in a Trench Coat

name: Scarlet Wolf
summary: If you're ready to run and play a deadly game of hide-and-seek, then come on in and make yourself at home. Behind the door, endless oppressive corridors, filthy walls, deadly traps, and a ravenous creature eagerly waiting to get up close and personal with you await.

name: Scavenger Hunt: Switzerland
summary:
In Scavenger Hunt: Switzerland you have to solve various puzzles to reach the goal. The puzzles lead you across Switzerland in different levels.
To master the levels and the puzzles you need internet access and a web browser!
The game will be available in English and German.

name: Scarlet Tower
summary: Hunt during the day, be hunted during the NIGHT! Fight bizarre monsters that will terrify you at night! Strengthen your hero by collecting relics, familiars from around the world.

name: SCP: Terror Hunt
summary: Terror Hunt is a modification for "SCP: Containment Breach". The mod is developed by the same creator of the Five Nights at Freddy's Mod. This mod adds and alters many aspects of the base game. These additions include new SCPs, new rooms, new items, and a brand new storyline for the main character!

name: Scila e il Drago Diamante
summary: Scila and the Diamond Dragon is a third-person exploration adventure designed for young children. Help Scila recover the lost scales of the Diamond Dragon by overcoming challenges and minigames with lots of little dragon friends!

name: Scrap Garden
summary: Scrap Garden is a charming puzzle platforming adventure where you play as the lonely robot Canny, who awakes in a post-apocalyptic world where all the other robotic citizens have been shut down and seized up. What happened to the City? Why did all the robots stop moving? Did anyone survive except him? Little rusty Canny has to do all he can to find the answers to these questions... and to fix everything!

name: Scission
summary: Scission is a dark and gruesome action game where you control two characters at once. Fight grotesque representations of the subconscious, master new skills and explore the depth of the human mind in this singleplayer game.

name: Science Simulator
summary: Science Simulator the science educational video game. explore, discover, learn.

name: Scars of the Soul
summary: The two countries went to war, unleashing forbidden powers. Years later, monsters ravage the land. The protagonist awakens, battles the monsters, explores the world, uncovers the truth of the past, and seeks to recover lost memories—a lonely journey of wandering and struggling against oneself.

name: Screw Dive
summary: Turn screws to unravel the mysteries of the underwater ruins! In order to dive deeper you will need to get rid of the octopuses guarding the ruins. But beware, one screw gone might result in a great collapse of the Stage!

name: Sci-Futa
summary: A futa x female NSFW visual novel. Follow a very pent-up futanari after a bad breakup as she goes to a space brothel and relieves her stress.

name: Screech of Steel: Gladiators
summary: Gladiator fights online in a free multiplayer game for PC and mobile devices. Create characters, buy weapons and armor, and participate in gladiator battles in up to 5x5 mode. Immerse yourself in the world of gladiatorial battles of ancient Rome!

name: Scope Battle Royale
summary: Scope, a fast-paced 100-player battle royale where memory wiped warriors fight for survival on a remote island. Dropped into a stylized world with no powers, only skill, strategy, and will-power.

name: Scrongly
summary: Scrongly is a free poker themed roguelite deckbuilding game inspired by Balatro. Make one card straight flushes, blow up your whole deck with bombs, play seven card poker hands, and much more!

name: Scrap Galaxy
summary:
Scrap Galaxy is a local build-and-destroy deathmatch game for up to 4 players. It is a 2D top-down shooter taking place out in space in a galactic junkyard. In this setting, the players are trying to survive by constructing space ships.

The game is round-based and each round is divided up into two phases: build phase and battle phase. During the build phase, each player gets a number of components and has to assemble a spaceship from them within a certain time limit. During the battle phase, the players pilot the ships. They battle against the other or team up against the garbage drones living in the junkyard.

The randomness and unpredictable nature of the game makes every round into a new challenge, because you always have a new ship to battle with, raising the stakes and making the game quite addictive.

name: Sculplings
summary: Welcome to the world of Sculplings! Here, trainers collect and battle a random assortment of hand-sculpted monsters in order to become the #1 Sculpling Champion! Sculplings is a mashup of roguelikes with traditional monster fighter games!

name: ScarFall: The Royale Combat
summary:
Scarfall, the ultimate battle royale for your mobile. It is online shooting game with survival challenge. One of the best multiplayer game with strategic play.

Experience the journey of real survival shooter on the battlefields. Explore the environments of the shooting battlegrounds with parachute landing from the high speed flying helicopters. Encounter the best strategy action multiplayer game to hit your play store this year. Build up your own rules for the online and offline multiplayer shooter. Survive in the shrinking safe zone with utmost 3 chances to win over the war and be the #1 survivor in unknown battlegrounds.

Featuring team death match and solo death match which you can play online or offline with intense 4v4 squad mode. Play as lone soldier OR with clan to combat with rivals answering the call of duty. Scarfall offers TPS (Third Person Shooter) and FPS (First Person Shooter) play with modern vehicles to roam around quickly and reach the final destination in shrinking circle.

name: Schlag den Star: Das Spiel
summary: After three successful Schlag den Raab video games, Schlag den Star is now going into the next round. You and up to three of your friends compete in 25 challenging original games from the TV show. Show everyone that you not only have the greatest general knowledge! You also need dexterity, skill and a good memory to win games like “Quiz”, “Archery”, “Water Maze” and “Throw Up”, “Count Sounds” or “Remember Things”.

name: SCP / Backrooms / Exit Bundle 6 in 1
summary: Darkness doesn't hide you — it hunts you.

name: Scopophobia
summary: A Cozy puzzle platformer with fast sections to keep you on your toes. Not trying to be the greatest platformer or innovate something incredible but give a charming experience using comedy and stylized characters with hand drawn graphics.

name: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass
summary: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass. Without memory, John Doe wanders the desert until he finds refuge in a haunted saloon. The ghosts of the past demand justice, and every clue brings him closer to an unsettling truth. Are you ready to uncover the secret of the Bitter Glass?

name: Scary Shadow Spot: All In
summary: Escape the nightmare by observing what shouldn’t exist. Lisa is trapped in ten floors that shift each loop: find the anomaly, survive, and uncover the truth behind the endless office.

name: Schar: Blue Shield Alliance
summary: Schar: Blue Shield Alliance is a cooperative twin-stick shooter that features a variety of complementing ship classes to choose from. Upgrade your ships, defeat hundreds of enemies, save the galaxy all with some friends from the comfort of your couch.

name: Schoolmates: The Mystery of the Magical Bracelet
summary: Long ago, a dark order of mages decided to wreak havoc upon the land but was kept at bay by another group known as the Selena order. Help the three young apprentices, Flex, Eva and Blondie to defeat a powerful mage in this incredible hidden object and point & click adventure!

name: School Paranormal Laboratory
summary: To those who will become investigators at our research institute, Our institute conducts research on mysterious phenomena and grudges that occur in schools. As an investigator, you will carry out field surveys, but it is a simple job that even those with no experience can perform.

name: Scram Kitty DX
summary: Scram Kitty DX is the new version of the critical hit shooter-platformer Scram Kitty and his Buddy on Rails, updated by Dakko Dakko for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita!Take control of Buddy, a rail-riding, laser-shooting young hero on a perilous quest to rescue his pet cat, Scram Kitty!

name: Scrap Divers
summary: Control your robot with just a finger to dodge sawblades, flames, and many other dangerous obstacles while flying through an infinite tunnel.

name: Scalemarch
summary: Create your dragon and put it to the test whilst surviving in a responsive world. Cleverly utilize physics, destruction, chemistry, and magic to progress and obtain even more upgrades! Each playthrough yields different opportunities where leveraging the core systems is the key to success.

name: Scarlett: Nichijou no Kyoukaisen
summary: A port of Scarlett originally on PC, adds a new chapter.

name: Schoolteacher Simulator
summary: Become a teacher in a local school. Teach kids, but make sure that your students stay focused during the lesson and react if they misbehave. Each day has unique events. Living school environment with each teacher and student having their own personality.

name: Scrap Wars: Td
summary: Scrap Wars: TD is a Post-Apocalyptic Tower Defence game where strategy meets chaos! Build and Upgrade powerful Towers, Customize their Strengths, and Defend your Base against relentless waves of Enemy Vehicles across three unique Scenarios or Battle for as long as you can in Endless Mode!

name: Scary Ferry
summary: Scary Ferry is a co-op horror game where you and your friends face monsters, traps, and treacherous waters. Complete challenging missions, explore dangerous dungeons, and uncover ISM's secrets.

name: Scrapnaut
summary: Scrapnaut is a top-down, base building survival game with steampunk elements. Explore an open world with different biomes, take care of oxygen, manage your farms, generate electricity, build your home and much more!

name: Scrap Mechanic
summary: Enter the creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic! Build fantastic machines, go on adventures with your friends and defend against waves of evil Farmbots in this imaginative multiplayer survival sandbox. With Scrap Mechanic’s powerful creation tools you can engineer your own adventures!

name: Scavenger T.O.M
summary: Scavenger T.O.M is a survival crafting game set in a radiation-contaminated world. Use your exploration robot, T.O.M, to gather resources, craft tools, and survive. With radiation spreading, efficient resource management is key. Plan expeditions strategically and craft wisely to stay alive.

name: Scyla
summary: Dive into the waters of Scyla, a third-person 3D exploration adventure inspired by Lovecraft's universe. Discover the mysteries hidden into the depths as you pilot a submarine through a strange cave system. Run away from a criature that stalks you.

name: Scorpion's Curse
summary: Help a team of six advanced androids in an epic quest to defeat the "Scorpion's Curse". The game is a card game roguelike where you need to navigate through shadowed chambers and use logic, experience, items and your deck to survive

name: Schlag den Raab: Das 3. Spiel
summary: Are you ready for high voltage and thrills of the extra class? Then Schlag den Raab: Das 3. Spiel is just right for you, because it brings the atmosphere of the popular TV show directly into your living room! Compete alone or with up to eight players against Stefan Raab or your friends. Compete in numerous original quiz and action games from the TV show. New questions, new games, old rules: Beat Raab!

name: Score the Fear
summary:
"Score the Fear" is a 3D adventure game in which you explore rooms and find hidden ghosts.

The little ghost that appeared before your eyes seems to want to become a proper evil spirit.

He'll scare you in a variety of ways, so rate him on whether he was scary or not.

The story will last up to three days and unfold depending on the results of the scoring.

Can you make this child's wish come true?

name: Science Skaters
summary: Join Max, Jin, Lia and Zev in this fun adventure and skate around thanks to their customizable nano-skates, solve science puzzles adapted to different ages. Explore, learn and fight to save the future of humanity!

name: Scarlet Hollow
summary: You've finally made it to the dead-end mining town of Scarlet Hollow, North Carolina, where your aunt is dead, your cousin hates you, and something otherworldly stalks you from the shadows. You won't be able to save everyone. You might not even be able to save yourself. Welcome home.

name: Screencheat
summary:
Screencheat is a chaotic split-screen multiplayer shooter that forces players to rethink the way they approach conventional multiplayer games. In the Screencheat arena, fast reaction times aren’t enough to keep you alive. When everyone is invisible, players will have to master the art of taking a not-so sneaky look at their opponent’s screens and working out where they are based on uniquely coloured areas of the map and distinctive landmarks.

Screencheat pays homage to iconic competitive first-person shooters such as Goldeneye, Perfect Dark and Halo, by blending the elements everyone loves about those games and shaking it up with its own unique take on the genre. When everyone’s used to playing by the rules, can you adapt to unconventional gaming quick enough to get the upper hand?

name: Scrap Race
summary: It's all downhill from here! Race down a hill with contraptions built from scrap! Play with up to 4 players in local multiplayer, or race against pre-fabricated "bot" opponents. Frantically build a wheel from scrap to roll down a hill: The contraption to roll the farthest wins! Start constructing your wheel by placing a scrap part anywhere on your blueprint! After that, just make sure any new parts you want to add are touching your contraption. To qualify for the race, make sure your construction covers all of the points on your blueprint.

name: Scuff Slayer
summary: Become the Scuff Slayer. The legend who will save the world from simplification! In this top-down 2D pixel art game, programming concepts are woven into the story.

name: Scooby Doo! Case File #3: Frights, Camera, Mystery!
summary: Scooby Doo! Case File #3: Frights, Camera, Mystery! is the third in the series of Scooby-Doo themed point and click adventure games by The Learning Company.

name: Schoolboy Runaway
summary: “You little rascal! Go study your lessons right now!” said the angry parents, grounding you. Try to outsmart them and find a way to have fun with your friends.

name: Schrödinger's Dungeon
summary: Enter a dungeon where no one can tell if you are alive or dead. Embark on a moral journey steeped in love and friendship, even as you slowly lose track of what it truly means to live or what purpose even is.

name: Scyphojel, Space Jellyfish!
summary: Scyphojel are space jellyfish. They hover above ground with some type of levitation, and can produce electricity at the ends of their tentacles. They're genderless and reproduce through strobilation. They also like to eat metal.

name: SCP: Experiments
summary: EXPERIMENTS is a first person horror game about escaping a research facility while being hunted by a creature

name: Scratch Inc.
summary:
Build an Empire, From Scratch.
Scratch cards, earn points, and grow your empire in this idle/incremental game. Upgrade your cards, unlock automation, prestige across industries, and climb the leaderboards.

name: Scarlet City of Devils
summary: A demon punk hack and slash adventure game! Explore the city of Elovelle at your own discretion and take down the toughest thugs this game has to offer.

name: Schemata
summary: Schemata is a fast-paced puzzle game based on digital logic diagrams. Race through logic circuits while organically learning how they work. The game is free with ads and has a $2 option to disable them. No other micro-transactions are in the game.

name: %s, Computer Love
summary: %s, Computer Love is a narrative-focused adventure game. You play as Flick, a post-human that explores the universe in hopes of making a friend in a world that has commoditized love and forgotten all about it.

name: Scaredy Cat
summary: A scaredy cat steps into the forest alone to find a rare flower for her friends — but some journeys are more than they seem.

name: Scramball
summary:
Scram, rattle, and roll into this maze of ball rolling bliss. Race against the clock and complete all 20 levels for a stellar score. Enter into four Scramball worlds containing five levels each. In World 1, you'll find basic keys and locks to acquire. Use magic keys to open doors but be watchful of holes. In this game of square physics, you may meet your demise at any instant.
Your score will depend on how fast you complete the game and how many faults occur! Your score can be entered in to the highscores at the end of the game! So who can have first place? Think your good enough? Then Scram, Rattle, and Roll!!

name: School Hero
summary: Immerse yourself in this nostalgic yet modern blend of arcade-style action and anime storytelling, as Sakura high calls for a new Hero to rise in style. Will you answer the call and save the day?

name: Scarlet Nexus: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:

• Scarlet Nexus
• Season Pass
• Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack
• Battle Attire Set -Red-
• Additional Attachment "The Other"
• SAS Plug-in Variations (3)

Choose between Yuito and Kasane, elite psionics each armed with a talent in psychokinesis and their own reason to fight. Complete both of their stories to unlock all the mysteries of a Brain Punk future caught between technology and psychic abilities.

name: ScootX
summary: The world’s first 100% physics-driven scooter simulation. From the wheels to the rider’s head, everything is powered by physics. Session tricks, grinds, and community-made parks with Mod.io support.

name: Scene It? Movie Night
summary: Scene It? Movie Night is a local multiplayer movie trivia game for PS3 and Xbox 360. It features over 600 questions using movie clips, stills, and text-based prompts. Players compete in short rounds using simple controls. The game has no online play, limited variety, and cartoon-style visuals. Designed mainly for casual group play.

name: Schwarzerblitz
summary:
Schwarzerblitz is an indie fighting game written in C++ and running on a custom version of the Irrlicht game engine. The game is completely in English and supports both keyboard and joypad, though the second is highly recommended. 
 
Let the Black Lightning strike!

name: Screaming Head
summary: You are a head and you have two feet, four wives, one house and a retirement fund. Unfortunately, your body is a jealous type. One day it attacks you and takes... everything! Well go ahead and scream your way through an eclectic gallery of various body parts to get your darlings back. AAAAAAAAAAAAA!

name: Screaming Noppy
summary: Control your character with different sounds, dodge traps, solve little puzzles, and create fun levels that will make your friends nervous

name: Scrabble Go
summary: Welcome to Scrabble Go, the new and updated version of the world’s favorite word game!

name: SCP-582 Slenderman Chapter 1
summary:
SCP-582 Slenderman Chapter 1 is the first part of the SCP-582 game series.
The game is first-person, based on the SCP foundation, and the famous creepypasta Slenderman. the game contains puzzles and secrets behind the SCP foundation and the Item SCP-582 Slenderman. with a new re-imagination of the SCP foundation.

name: Schnappi: 3 Fun-Games
summary:
From the depths of the Internets it emerged and was from then on no more from the German medium landscape to be excluded: Schnappi, the small crocodile of the Nile. The single was distinguished in Germany recently with double platinum, and also the not-German-language foreign country came in the meantime on the taste: In the Netherlands it made itself Schnappi already cosy at place 2 the single Charts. No question, Schnappi met the correct nerve with young and adults.

And now the singing reptile opens itself to show also on the PC & Playstation. In three plays the player can make sure of the fact that this crocodile can do more than just singing.

In Schnappi snatch! Schnappi makes what he can do best: it snatches! In this case there is insects, on which he foresaw it. But also with an allegedly so harmless booty highest watchfulness is announced. Because in 20 levels are not only harmless Brummer, but also stinging wasps.

And to the researcher Schnappi may not go also into the net! Apart from a good reactivity of the player there above all Schnappis jump strength is in demand.

With Schappi think! the player must exert the brain a little as birth aids, so that Schnappi from its egg can hop.

And in Schnappi dance! the proof is finally begun that a genuine Popstar must be able to dance evenly also, in order to exist in this hard Business.

Schnappi - 3 Fungames is a successful pastime for all fans of the green medium star.

name: Scale: Rise of Dragons
summary: SCALE is a highly competitive and FREE fantasy card game that takes all of the best mechanics of popular TCG's and puts them into one action-packed game that gives you ALL of the cards for free. You can react to every move your opponent makes, making for exciting and fast paced competition!

name: ScrapDown
summary: Scrap Down is action shooter arena in the style of a 2D shooter set in a space theme. It offers casual and fast-paced shooting mechanics that are easy to understand. It enhances the fun by allowing players to prank each other with in-game items.

name: Schizm: Mysterious Journey
summary: As two survivors of a spaceship crash, you must solve insidious puzzles to rendezvous with each other and uncover the mystery of the abandoned planet Argilus.

name: Scrap
summary: Shoot, kick, and detonate your way through a post tech apocalyptic wasteland where robots reign terror upon the resourceful Scrappers. Scrap foes, unlock weapons, play alone or with friends and take back the world in this free, 3D, action, twin stick, shooter.

name: Scorn: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition includes the official digital soundtrack of the game, composed by Aethek & Lustmord, and a 192-page digital artbook including a massive amount of exclusive artwork and research designs from the nightmarish universe of Scorn.

name: SCP: Run For Freedom
summary: This game is based on the SCP universe, you must escape from mobile task forces, facility guards, anomalies and some other danger. You will go through different areas to advance in your adventure and you will be able to defend yourself with weapons or hide and go unnoticed.

name: SCP: CB Multiplayer Reborn
summary: Survive the chaos of SCP Foundation! Step into a thrilling SCP horror experience with story-driven co-op, intense PvP Breach mode, and randomized maps. Play as Class-D, scientist, SCPs, and more, each role bringing unique challenges in an unpredictable, immersive facility.

name: SCP: Fragmented Minds
summary: Fragmented Minds explores the reality in which The Foundation fails to contain a breach after a cataclysmic XK-Scenario. You will awaken in the derelict depths of Mars Site-113 to discover what happened, and piece together the solution to the most devastating event humanity has ever seen.

name: Scandal
summary: An adventure game developed by Sugar & Rockets with cut-scenes animated by Production I.G. Scandal is also technically the 5th entry in the Yarudora series.

name: Screwdom 3D
summary: Screwdom 3D is a challenging and brain-teasing screw master that will put your problem-solving skills to the ultimate test. This exciting screwdom 3D combines the thrill of sorting with the fun of playing screw master, offering a perfect balance of relaxation and brain-teasing action.

name: Scooby Doo's Maze Chase
summary: You control Scooby as he chases ghosts through a maze while himself being chased by the skull & crossbones. If three ghosts are caught within a time-limit, the skull will disappear and a submarine sandwich appears. When eaten, it gives you a magic bone which when dropped in the path of the skull will momentarily freeze it in place. When Scooby is caught by the skull, the difficulty will go down. There's 10 mazes in all, but with the keyboard addon for Intellivision you can also make your own mazes.

name: Scoot Kaboom and the Tomb of Doom
summary: Scoot Kaboom and the Tomb of Doom is a fiendishly fun action platformer that all takes place on one enormous screen. Run, dive and dodge through the twisting maze, evading spikes, saws, fireballs, portals and even more and escape the Tomb of Doom!

name: Scourge of the Village
summary: "Scourge Of The Village"is a Chinese folklore horror-themed text decryption game. An ordinary intern reporter, Chen Xi, is investigating a news event about factory sewage discharge, but she somehow fell into the torment of nightmares.

name: Schlag den Star: Das 2. Spiel
summary: Schlag den Star finally enters the next round. Elton and the studio shine in a completely new graphic garb and are more beautiful and realistic than ever. You and your friends can expect 20 exciting and challenging games. Only those who can prove themselves to be all-round talents have a chance of winning.

name: Schismo's Sideshow
summary:
A hand-drawn action roguelike set inside of a strange circus attraction.

Defeat hordes of fast-moving enemies to generate energy for the circus. Collect Schismo's lost Stamps to change your playstyle and raise the skill ceiling. Meta-progression comes in the form of Marlbes that offer mutually exclusive choices.

name: Scrabble
summary: Enjoy the classic word-spelling game with your friends either locally or online, and add computer opponents of varying difficulties to make things interesting. When you’re up to it, compete against players of your skill level around the world in a variety of exciting multiplayer modes. Rank up, win, and challenge others as well as yourself—it’s Scrabble like you’ve never seen before!

name: Scornhorn, Act One
summary:
Tippy's mother is dead...

Where there once lay a body, in what had once been their home and prison, there was now only ash. The fire stole everything… So, unburdened, Tippy took it for herself. With her newly awakened powers over flame, she'll light a funeral pyre for the world that still reveres her so-called saint of a mother.

Scornhorn is a virtual stageplay about victims and villains... and the staggering steps you have to take before healing can begin.

name: SCP: Containment Breach Remastered
summary: SCP - Containment Breach is a free survival horror game based on the works of the SCP Foundation community. Your goal is to escape Site-19 doing whatever it takes to do so. Avoid tons of obstacles on your way to freedom.

name: Schein
summary: Use the magic of light to explore hidden worlds, solve challenging puzzles and defeat deadly beasts in award-winning Schein, possibly the trickiest platformer you’ll play all year.

name: SCP: November 2010
summary: It's November 2010. You find yourself lost in a forest rumored to be home to SCP-173, a deadly and unrelenting entity. With only a flashlight, you must search for hidden plushies while staying one step ahead of your stalker. Can you keep it in your sights long enough to escape the nightmare?

name: Scytheful
summary:
Scytheful is an indie game about 3 kids pulling a DOOM-like extermination on underground monsters (typical activities amirite?)

Play through a vast underworld, where each separate world has its own unique charm and feel to it. Show those monsters from a failed experiment no mercy! (Because, well yk- they aren't human- well, were- bleh nevermind, lore too confusing lol)

name: Scurge: Hive
summary: An infectious retro hardware classic from 2006 has been revived. Only you can save the world from the deadly virus known as Scurge.

name: Scarlet Enigma
summary: Investigate a chilling birthday murder in a branching mystery filled with secrets, suspects, and puzzles. Uncover the truth, bend time, and stop the killer before reality begins to unravel.

name: Scarlet Deer Inn
summary: A delightful story-driven exploration platformer game about facing inner demons. Help with duties around the inn, meet unusual characters and try to fit into the new place during the day while trying to run from your anxieties and nightmares during the night.

name: Scud: The Disposable Assassin
summary: SCUD: The Disposable Assassin is a video game based on the Rob Schrab comic series of the same name.

name: Scions of Fate
summary: Scion of Fate Online, one of the top MMORPG game in the history, now available on Steam.

name: Scarlet Hollow: Episode 1
summary: The free-to-play first episode of a horror-mystery game with dark humor and hand-drawn art from award-winning graphic novelist Abby Howard.

name: School Wars
summary: School Wars was released in 2012 for the PSP. In 2015, it was released on the PSVita in a double pack with its fandisc called School Wars: Zenkan Pack Honpen & Sotsugyou Sensen.

name: Schizophrenia
summary: Schizophrenia is a game where you have to not go crazy and get out of the bunker. Use all the items you can find to survive. Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.

name: School Photo Transformer
summary: Koichi, who has gained the ability to transform, creates a special graduation album as part of the photography club...!

name: Scooby-Doo Mystery
summary:
This version is different from its Genesis counterpart. While the gameplay is similar (exploring levels to collect clues and solve the mystery), there are four different episodes for this version. While visiting the Drabwell Ranch, ghost's interrupt the festivities and the gang must find out who is behind the hauntings and why. Another adventure takes the gang to Deadman's Cove where a ghostly pirate has been scaring off tourists and it is up to Scooby and the Gang to bring it to a halt. The other two mysteries take place at a fun fair and a haunted mansion.

Players can use Scooby's unique sniffing ability to find clues. Scooby also consume Scooby Snacks to reduce the fright meter. Additionally there are a series of mini-games that player can participate in such as "Wac-A-Monster" or "Make a Scooby Sandwich". The graphics are faithfully recreated to resemble the long-running Hanna Barbara series.

name: Scooby-Doo
summary: Join the Scooby gang as they try to solve the mystery of Spooky Island. Players will roam the movie locations in search of clues, solving a series of small mysteries as they work to uncover the island?s ultimate mystery. Along the way the players will interact with familiar characters, explore environments based on the movie and collect items they can use to trap diabolical villains.

name: Scooby-Doo!: Castle Capers
summary:
Scooby-Doo!: Castle Capers is a puzzle adventure game starring Scooby and Shaggy from the cartoon series.

The gang's car broke down and they had to stop at a mansion that turned out to be haunted. It's now their job to investigate the mansion and find out what is really going on.

The mansion acts as a level select area and the place where most of the conversation between the gang and the characters in the mansion occurs. After clearing a level, the next door is unlocked and players can go there. Players can't replay the levels they've already cleared.

In the levels, players have a time limit to find a clue and leave the level through the entrance. Players can switch between Scooby and Shaggy at any time and will need to use both characters to open paths for each other and solve the puzzles of the levels. Although the game has hearts in the top left corner of the screen, both Scooby and Shaggy lose one heart if the enemy touches them and have to start the level from the beginning.

name: Scoop Kick!
summary: Help Ms. Cream and her friends on their quest to retrieve all the stolen ice cream from the evil Juice Bunch! Venture through more than 5 different worlds in this arcade inspired game where your goal is to kick scoops and assemble ice cream cones. Aim for the high score or try to get the best time!

name: Scooby-Doo! & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Adventure
summary: Join the mystery with Scooby and friends and leap into the zany worlds of Looney Tunes in Scooby Doo! & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Adventure. Solve the mystery of Kraken Cove with Scooby, Shaggy and the rest of the Mystery Machine Gang or help Bugs and Daffy discover who is behind the dastardly defective MOCME products that are creating chaos. Solve puzzles and fight enemies as you unlock the mysteries in this exciting cartoon world come to life. Find gifts, safes and treasure chests and use the loot you collect to customize your character and empower them with special ability upgrades.

name: SCP: Site-19
summary:
Welcome to Site-19.
Site-19 is the largest Foundation facility currently in operation, housing hundreds of Safe- and Euclid-class anomalies. Objects contained (some SCPs are not in the game yet) at this facility include: SCP-055, SCP-131, SCP-173, SCP-387, SCP-668, SCP-931. (Source: SCP-wiki.net)

Play in the randomly generated map. Find the way out of the facility. Do NOT get caught by SCP-106. Avoid contact with SCP-049. Do NOT look away SCP-173. Find keycards to make your way out. Read Documents to get hints on how to escape, how to act with SCPs.

name: SchoolBoy Simulator
summary: Outsmart your parents and escape their watchful eyes!

name: Scarlet Sails
summary:
Hoist the Jolly Roger and set sail to find the legendary Titan’s Treasure! Do you fight with a cutlass or with magic? Are you biding your time until you can shoot your captain in the back, or are you the reason the rum is gone?
A game written by Felicity Banks for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Schiffbruch
summary:
Schiffbruch ("Shipwreck") is a freeware survival game where the player controls a desperate castaway trying to subsist on the resources of a small equatorial island after his ship sunk near the coast. The game renders the randomly-generated isle terrain and its features with tiny isometric graphics, with areas gradually becoming visible as the main character explores the surroundings. The large right side interface shows a small map of the revealed terrain at the top, a menu with action commands below it and several meters at the bottom for daylight time, water, food, and health. 
 
The player has to guide the little man around the land, and give him orders to search around for food, useful materials and other essentials. Unlucky but resourceful, he can assemble tools, build tents, set SOS signs and do other work, foraging nearby bushes for food and drinking water from winding streams. When evening starts, he automatically collapses on the floor and goes to sleep, and the player must make sure he's near his makeshift hut at night, otherwise the next day starts with a substantial health hit. His chances of being rescued are displayed as a percentage number below a lifesaver icon at the top. The game ends, of course, when the main character dies for some reason.

name: School Days LxH
summary: A port of School Days for the Playstation 2.

name: Scared Tube
summary: Scared Tube is an indie, Early-Access horror-style game. You play as an influencer that explores abandon haunted locations. Like any horror influencer, you need to determine what kind of ghost you are dealing with for your audience. Get those likes and subscriptions up for currency and gear.

name: Screw Box Jam: Bus Out
summary:
Screw Box Jam: The Ultimate Screw-Matching Puzzle Game!
Welcome to Screw Box Jam, where you solve satisfying matching puzzles by organizing screws and boxes in the perfect order! With intuitive controls and a smooth interface, anyone can enjoy this engaging puzzle experience. Watch as screws and boxes come to life with playful mechanics, making each level both fun and rewarding. If you love brain-teasing challenges, this game is tailor-made for you!

name: Scrutator Tenebris
summary: Become a pathologist in a sinister mansion filled with unsolved mysteries. Examine bodies and make decisions that alter the course of the investigation. Your choices shape multiple story endings in this narrative-driven psychological horror — where every secret could cost your sanity.

name: Scratchers
summary: Scratchers is an incremental game where you scratch cards to earn cash, unlock upgrades, and hire little scratchers to do the scratching for you. Discover rare cards, and optimize your earnings as you climb to scratcher supremacy!

name: Scent of Sorrow
summary: Play as a dog named Lula, waking up lost in an eerie forest. Use your keen sense of smell to explore the environment where fragments of your memory will help you unveil your past. This heartfelt narrative adventure is a new take on the theme of animal abandonment.

name: Schism
summary:
Continuing the tradition of modernizing Doom, Schism brings its own unique and innovative twists. Through six years of development, it has seen massive upgrades which have, in their own right, bolstered the game to something much more than most of other Brutal Doom based projects.

New classes have been added, such as the Paladin — bestowed with improved renditions of a few of Hexen's iconic relics, as well as other new and absolutely savage melee weapons — and the Sorcerer — a master elementalist with an all-obliterating, wide array of magics that make the BFG9000 look utterly flaccid. The classic UAC Marine recieved multiple new firearms designed to round out his arsenal. All classes can use firearms, though only the UAC Marine can use all of them. Despite these massively powerful additions, Schism is not a power fantasy. New, much more dangerous foes await the heroes, while the pre-existing roster was rebalanced.

name: School Bus Fun
summary: School Bus Fun features a heart-warming story about a mother taking her daughter and her friends to school who takes this up as a profession investing in new cars and equipment. The game offers a variety of unique maps, vehicles, upgrades, characters, cutscenes, trophies and much more. Meet and transport all the kids with their different personalities and preferences! Learn to cope with varying demands and aim for the perfect scores and all gold trophies.

name: Scout
summary:
Scout is the ambitious son of a well known adventurer. His father explored lost places and donated any treasures he found to let the world see it. However, there had been one treasure he never managed to locate and retrieve: The golden hazelnut of an ancient squirrel temple. Everything he found out about it had been written down in his diary which Scout years later recovered and further researched and eventually located the temple. Now he needs your help to explore the it's secrets and show the world his father's life's work!

'Scout' is a short and compact, atmospheric adventure game, mainly focusing on creating a harmonic environment and nice, simple graphics rather than complex gameplay and features. The goal is to encourage the player to take their time while playing, stop occasionally and just have a look around instead of rushing through it, while still enjoying this ride!

name: Scarabeus
summary:
THE MAZE CRAZY PUZZLE CHALLENGE THAT WILL AMAZE YOU! 
 
Weave your way through the maze of passages which takes you within the ancient tombs and causeways of the Pharaohs. The seeemingly innocent and sturdy-looking floor tiles can move, change, flip and reverse your direction at anytime, throwing you for a serious loop. And, throughout the tangled labyrinth of causeways, there are scarab beetles hiding in the tiles, trying to block your way. 
But if you can gain the power of the sun god, "Ra", you just might have the skill and cunning to find your way to the Tomb of the Pharaoh, Scarabeus. 
So, if you're ready for the challenge of your life, power up Pyramids of Ra. You'll be amazed. 
 
Scarabeus is prototype of a very simple puzzle game. In it, the player must figure out the best path to draw one line through a series of tiles without any overlap. In fact, to give the player extra incentive not to backtrack, the tiles actually crumble away after use, which leaves no choice but to venture on. Players must cause all of the black tiles to disappear, and then land back on the starting square, with a reward for a quick performance.

name: Scrappage
summary: In this unforgiving roguelite twin stick shooter, death awaits you behind every corner. Fight your way through hordes of monsters, eliminate bosses and loot their valuable items and body parts. With them you can enhance your own body, unlock powerful skills and create your own unique builds.

name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
summary: Scooby Doo, Shaggy, and the whole gang are back in another exciting mystery adventure just right for the 6-9 crowd. Case File #2 features a similar format to the first case file, The Glowing Bug Man, with a few new features that add to the enjoyment.

name: School Days
summary: "School Days" is a highly flexible campus development game. Summer watermelons, afternoon ceiling fans, and a throbbing heart transport you back to the early 2000s. Study, exercise, and fall in love—will you retrace your past path or live a different life? 12 years from now, what will your future hold? It's up to you to decide!
